name: Dark Lord's Maze
description:
DARK LORD'S MAZE is a 3D dungeon crawler made in 8-bit style.

Jump right into this colorful, pixelated world full of traps, enemies and different environmental hazards and enjoy a true classic gaming experience, fueled by the sounds of SID and a fair amount of difficulty!

Demo of the first level available now.
Compatible with XInput controllers.

Have fun!
